dialog.text: Hello! Welcome to Aster Yellows meadow! (click text box to continue)
Your goal is to return this empty plane of dirt into the lush meadow it once was!
Let's start by planting some seeds! Use WASD or the arrow keys to move, and click on a patch of soil to plant a seed!
Great job! Plant as many seeds as you'd like!
The seeds will grow on their own, but you can also click on them to water them!
Oh no! One of your flowers is starting to wilt-- maybe you should try watering it?
hmm I think it still looks thirsty, why don't you try watering it again?'
Hmmm... Looks like this flower has some sort of infection... let's hope it doesn't spread to your other plants
Wow-- that infection spread pretty quickly.
I'm afraid our only hope at this point is to start the meadow over as we don't have the means to cure this...
Here, I've added a button for you to click whenever you would like to restart this meadow! Second time's the charm!
